title: Reliable Big Sister….?
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Karin-san, Rin got a praise from Kayochin for the clothes you picked the other day, she said it fits Rin nya~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, I’m glad I picked that one then. It’s hard to narrow it down though, Rin-chan, because you’re so cute no matter what you wear<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh, Rin is cute….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, truly. Next time, I want to pick a swimsuit♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>E-, ehehe…. Then, Rin would like to ask for something else nya! Umm, it’s a different kind of request though<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>What may it be?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin got a red mark on a quiz…. Rin would like to ask Karin-san to be Rin’s tutor nya<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Karin-san is like a big sister that can do anything, so Rin is relying on you nya! Please!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>A-, al….right. L-, leave it to me! Ah, but wait just for a bit! I have an urgent business to take care of, let me send a mail okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Got it nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch1002/>*press press press*<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>「Kanata! Help! Come to Akiba right now!!」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
